General.Name: Wonders Information
General.Description: Wonders Information Co., Ltd operates as a smart city software and service provider in China. The company offers medical and health, smart government affairs, market supervision, people's livelihood protection, urban safety, smart education, information and communication technology (ICT), information technology (IT), and health management services; and construction and operation of smart city public platforms. It also provides integration, operation and maintenance, consulting, security, and value-added ICT services; cloud data center, digital park, network security, and other services; cloud management platform and cloud service bus; unified payment platform; artificial intelligence services; internet of things; and big data center services. The company has approximately 1,300 software products and copyrights with intellectual property rights. Wonders Information Co., Ltd was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
